评论详情: My daughter loved this dress, very nice quality. Has a nice piece of added material under arms to cover the upper side of ribs with the loose sleeves. I was debating about this one or one from Lola and the boys, and went with this one, much cheaper and was still super cute. Ran a bit big though, wish I could have gotten a smaller size

评论概述: Great dress, does shed a little
评论详情: This dress is great quality and my kiddo loves it!  (I ordered the size 6-7, kiddo is 50" tall and about 55 lbs, and this fits well with a little room to grow.)  The matching hair tie is a cute add-on.  I wasn't ready for the amount of shedding when I opened the bag though.  There were little bits of black fringe that spread all over my floor.  I would have expected some of the sequins to fall off, not a black fuzz flurry.  The dress itself is well made and the fabric does feel a little heavy, so if you are in a hotter climate I would keep that in mind.  But overall I would order similar items again, or maybe even this one to gift since it's so cute.
TTS and material feels nice. Didn’t shrink after being washed/dried nor did it fade in color.
My daughter loves this dress! It fits well, isn't itchy, and looks so fun to wear.  The length hits at her knees,  but isn't baggy. And the bow elastic is a perfect matching addition.

评论概述: Absolutely Stunning Dress for Special Occasions!
评论详情: I recently bought the GRACE KARIN Girls Flutter Sleeve Sequin Dress for my daughter, and it has truly exceeded all my expectations! This dress is the perfect combination of elegance and fun, making it ideal for formal events, parties, or even family gatherings.  The flutter sleeves add a charming touch, making the dress look so whimsical and graceful. The sequin embellishments are beautifully crafted, providing just the right amount of sparkle without being overwhelming. My daughter feels like a princess every time she puts it on!  The crew neck design is comfortable and allows for easy wear, while the included hairbow is a delightful bonus that completes the outfit perfectly. It’s fantastic to have everything coordinated, making dressing up a breeze. The dress fits true to size, and the quality of the fabric is impressive—it’s both soft against her skin and durable enough for active play.  We received countless compliments at the last event we attended, and my daughter felt so confident and happy wearing it. I highly recommend the GRACE KARIN Flutter Sleeve Sequin Dress for any parent looking for a stunning dress for their little girl. It's a wonderful addition to her wardrobe, and I know it will create lasting memories!
Daughter loves the dress. It looks cute and fits accurately. She uses it to play dress up as a diva.

I got the GRACE KARIN Girls Flutter Sleeve Sequin Dress for my daughter, and it’s just stunning! The sparkly design catches the light beautifully, making her feel like a princess at any party. The flutter sleeves add a lovely touch of elegance without being overwhelming. I appreciate that it has a comfortable crew neck, so she can move around easily while looking fabulous. The hairbow that comes with it is a sweet bonus, tying the whole outfit together. We’ve received so many compliments every time she wears it! If you're looking for a fancy dress that stands out and makes your little girl feel special, this is definitely a winner!

This is such a beautiful dress! I ordered it for the holiday season. The sequins are of nice quality and the red is a nice, deep red. It fits a tad bit loose on my 8 year old, but glad she'll have the space to grow into it.

This sequin dress is absolutely stunning! The red color is vibrant and the sequins give it the perfect amount of sparkle, making it ideal for formal parties and special events. My daughter felt like a princess wearing it, and the flutter sleeves add a lovely, delicate touch. The matching hairbow was a sweet bonus that completed the whole look.  The dress is well-made and feels comfortable, which is a big plus. Despite all the sequins, my daughter didn’t complain about any itchiness, and the inner lining kept her comfortable throughout the day. I also appreciate the crew neck design, which offers a modest and elegant look suitable for kids. It’s fancy without being over-the-top, making it great for multiple occasions like weddings, birthdays, or holiday parties.  The fit was true to size. I ordered the 6-7 years size, and it fit my daughter perfectly, with enough room for her to move around and dance freely. She wore it to a family wedding and got so many compliments! It’s both stylish and age-appropriate, which can sometimes be hard to find in fancy dresses for younger girls.  Overall, this dress exceeded my expectations in terms of quality, design, and fit. It’s the perfect combination of elegance and fun, and I highly recommend it for anyone looking to dress their little one up for a special occasion!
The dress is so cute and fits so well.  My 8 year old loves the dress but needs an undershirt because its a bit itchy.  Well enough made.

评论概述: "Sparkly and adorable for any special occasion!"

I also appreciate the care instructions—hand-washing helps keep the sequins intact, and the dress should hold up well with proper care.  If you’re looking for something sparkly and fun, this dress is a great choice for your little one's next special event! Just make sure to check the specific size chart to get the right fit.

My 5 year old put this on and said she felt like Taylor Swift. I'ts very fun and sparkly. It doesn't seem to be itchy or have sequins that are bothering her around the neck or arms.  It's well-made. Great for a special occasion or costume.

I had a son, but I have a niece that shares my same style. This will be a perfect holiday dress for a young girl. I love finding something I would wear in my size and sending it to her. This dress is a great value and will make any girl that loves fashion happy.
Really sparkling, free bow! Fit as expected, swings a little. There is an under coating so it's not itchy. Sequins do not flip. It's fun but not really everyday quality.
This dress is adorable! It's well made and fits like I expected. Perfect for the upcoming holidays and all the events that come with it. I love the swing style!

This dress is so cute! My 4yo loves it and immediately wanted to wear it. She wears a 5T, which is what I ordered. It is a little loose but not bad, room to grow. The matching bow is adorable. She has already decided that she is wearing it for picture day! Great buy!

Out of all the random brands on Amazon these days, Grace Karin is one I have bought from DOZENS of times over the years and has become a name I know I can trust. This dress is no exception! It is fabulous quality, well made, all seams finished, no shedding sequins. My 5yo niece screamed when she opened this dress and has been wearing it nonstop. The fit is accurate to the size chart; the color, accurate to the product images. Highly recommend this dress and this brand!

评论概述: Limited use - good for a specific party or dress up.
评论详情: My four year old is in love with this sequin dress.  Pros: It's sparkly, comfortable for her, and looks nice on.  Cons: It started shedding sequins fairly quickly (after one day of wear) and I know there is no way it'd make it through a wash cycle. This will have to be handwashed, and even that I'm nervous about how much more it'll cause it to shed. I hoped this could be a regular use dress, but it'll wind up in the dress up bin. She loves it, but it's not quite high enough quality to stand up to the antics of an active 5 year old.

Oh my, this purple sequins Grace Karin girls fluttered sleeved dress is ADORABLE! It is excellent quality. It is also lined, including lined sleeves providing extra comfortability as most ladies know that dresses with sequins can sometimes be itchy and scratchy feeling. NOT THIS ONE THOUGH! My 6 year old smaller sized 41l petite princess loves it! She says it is not scratchy nor did wearing this dress cause any discomfort. “It is so comfy and beautiful mama!” my thrilled little one happily said. We purchased the size 6 and it fits her with just a little bit of extra room to grow- just how we like our dresses to get longevity and extra wears out of them! Buy this! I promise you won’t regret it and your little diva will thank you. Especially when it makes her feel like the extra special, beautiful princess she is. ✨🩷

评论概述: Gorgeous dress and it isn't itchy!

The style is cute. The fit is not what I expected and the look is OK. It does scratch my daughters arms when she wears it so we definitely won’t be wearing it too often.

I have to start off by saying that this dress is absolutely beautiful. I love the multicular sequence and they do not look cheap at all. The dress is true to size and came in perfect packaging.
